A paginated response wrapper for event data that combines a list of events with pagination metadata.

## Key Components

- **EventsResponse**: Main DTO class that encapsulates paginated event results
- **events**: List of `EventResponse` objects representing the actual event data
- **pageInfo**: `PageInfo` object containing pagination metadata (page size, current page, total elements, etc.)
- **Lombok annotations**: `@Data`, `@Builder`, `@NoArgsConstructor`, `@AllArgsConstructor` for automatic code generation
- **Swagger annotations**: `@Schema` for API documentation

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a paginated events response
EventsResponse response = EventsResponse.builder()
    .events(List.of(
        EventResponse.builder().id(1L).title("Conference").build(),
        EventResponse.builder().id(2L).title("Workshop").build()
    ))
    .pageInfo(PageInfo.builder()
        .pageNumber(0)
        .pageSize(10)
        .totalElements(25L)
        .totalPages(3)
        .build())
    .build();

// Using in REST controller
@GetMapping("/events")
public EventsResponse getEvents(@RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size) {
    return eventService.getEventsPaginated(page, size);
}
```
